channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- CODESYS OPC DA Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- CODESYS OPC DA Server

item.title: CVE-2022-1794|2024-08-03T00:16:59.853Z -- codesys -- codesys%20opc%20da%20server
item.description: The CODESYS OPC DA Server prior V3.5.18.20 stores PLC passwords as plain text in its configuration file so that it is visible to all authorized Microsoft Windows users of the system.
